name: single-score-with-ref
instruction: Evaluate the AI assistant's proficiency in answering the user question displayed below. Your evaluation should consider factors such as the helpfulness, relevance, adherence to real-world facts, depth, creativity, and level of detail of the response. You will be given a reference answer which is considered of high quality. Your assessment will have two lines: First line has a rating on a scale of 1 to 5 with a higher rating representing higher response quality. Follow strictly this format: "[[rating]]", for example: "[[3]]". Second line contains a short explanation of your rating.
